languages.text: "Мне прежде не доводилось служить на корабле, но вера в Него должна быть всюду единообразна и соответственна Кредо, не так ли? Я вижу много... неортодоксального в том, как живут пустотники. Но, милостью Императора, я разожгу свет Его учения достаточно ярко, чтобы изгнать тени из сердец ваших подданных".

"Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."
languages.original_text: "Мне прежде не доводилось служить на корабле, но вера в Него должна быть всюду единообразна и соответственна Кредо, не так ли? Я вижу много... неортодоксального в том, как живут пустотники. Но, милостью Императора, я разожгу свет Его учения достаточно ярко, чтобы изгнать тени из сердец ваших подданных".

traits.locale_text: "Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see a lot of unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I shall rekindle the light of His teachings so bright it will banish the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

"Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see a lot of unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I shall rekindle the light of His teachings so bright it will banish the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I shall rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I shall rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

"Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

languages.text: "Ich habe noch nie auf einem Schiff gedient, aber der Glaube an Ihn muss überall gleich und konsistent sein, findet Ihr nicht? Ich sehe viel Unorthodoxes im Leben der Raumfahrer, aber mit der Gnade des Imperators werde ich das Licht Seiner Lehren neu entfachen, bis es die Schatten aus den Herzen Eurer Untertanen vertreibt."
languages.original_text: "Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe noch nie auf einem Schiff gedient, aber der Glaube an Ihn muss überall gleich und konsistent sein, findet Ihr nicht? Ich sehe viel Unorthodoxes im Leben der Raumfahrer, aber mit der Gnade des Imperators werde ich das Licht Seiner Lehren neu entfachen, bis es die Schatten aus den Herzen Eurer Untertanen vertreibt."

languages.text: «No había servido nunca a bordo de una nave, pero la fe en el Emperador debe ser uniforme y consistente con el Credo en todas partes, ¿no le parece? Veo demasiada heterodoxia en la vida de los viajeros del vacío, pero por la gracia del Emperador avivaré la llama de Sus enseñanzas hasta haber desterrado las sombras de los corazones de sus súbditos».
languages.original_text: "Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

traits.locale_text: «No había servido nunca a bordo de una nave, pero la fe en el Emperador debe ser uniforme y consistente con el Credo en todas partes, ¿no le parece? Veo demasiada heterodoxia en la vida de los viajeros del vacío, pero por la gracia del Emperador avivaré la llama de Sus enseñanzas hasta haber desterrado las sombras de los corazones de sus súbditos».

languages.text: 「船で仕えたことはありませんが、皇帝への信仰はどの場所でも一様で、信条と一致するべき、そうですよね？ヴォイズマンの生活には多くの異端が見受けられますが、皇帝の恩寵により、神の教えの光を再び灯し、臣民の心から影が消え去るまでその火を燃やし続けましょう」
languages.original_text: "Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

traits.locale_text: 「船で仕えたことはありませんが、皇帝への信仰はどの場所でも一様で、信条と一致するべき、そうですよね？ヴォイズマンの生活には多くの異端が見受けられますが、皇帝の恩寵により、神の教えの光を再び灯し、臣民の心から影が消え去るまでその火を燃やし続けましょう」

languages.text: “我之前从来没有在船上服役过，但无论身在哪里，我对祂的信仰都毫不动摇，始终与国教的教条保持一致。信仰必须如此，是这样吧？我在船上的生活方式中看到了许多不正统的东西，但我愿以帝皇的恩典起誓——我将会重新点燃祂的教诲之光，直到祂的圣光驱散您臣民心中的阴影为止。”
languages.original_text: "Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

traits.locale_text: “我之前从来没有在船上服役过，但无论身在哪里，我对祂的信仰都毫不动摇，始终与国教的教条保持一致。信仰必须如此，是这样吧？我在船上的生活方式中看到了许多不正统的东西，但我愿以帝皇的恩典起誓——我将会重新点燃祂的教诲之光，直到祂的圣光驱散您臣民心中的阴影为止。”

languages.text: « Jamais encore je n'avais servi à bord d'un vaisseau, mais la foi en Sa grandeur se doit d'être constante et fidèle au Credo où que l'on se trouve. Je constate que la vie des cosmomarins est bien peu orthodoxe, mais par la grâce de l'Empereur, je raviverai la lumière de Ses enseignements jusqu'à ce qu'elle chasse les ombres qui sévissent dans le cœur de vos sujets. »
languages.original_text: "Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."

traits.locale_text: « Jamais encore je n'avais servi à bord d'un vaisseau, mais la foi en Sa grandeur se doit d'être constante et fidèle au Credo où que l'on se trouve. Je constate que la vie des cosmomarins est bien peu orthodoxe, mais par la grâce de l'Empereur, je raviverai la lumière de Ses enseignements jusqu'à ce qu'elle chasse les ombres qui sévissent dans le cœur de vos sujets. »

languages.text: "Daha önce bir gemide hizmet vermedim ancak O'nun inancı her yerde aynı ve İtikat'le uyumlu olmalıdır, öyle değil mi? Uçsuz erlerinin yaşamında çok fazla geniş mezheplilik görüyorum ancak İmparator'un inayetiyle O'nun öğretilerinin ateşini yeniden yakacağım. Ta ki tebaalarının kalbindeki gölgeler yok olana kadar."
languages.original_text: "Never before have I served on a ship, but the faith in Him must be uniform and consistent with the Creed in every place, must it not? I see much unorthodoxy in the life of the voidsmen, but by the Emperor's grace, I will rekindle the light of His teachings until it banishes the shadows from your subjects' hearts."
